short_summary: bid solicitation for methane and ethane gas analyzer
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 23240-220524/A dated January 18, 2022 with a closing of February 16, 2022 at 14:00 EST. The Ministry of Natural Resources Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one methane and ethane gas analyzer and its accompanying hard-shell carrying case.
